title: Pomme et Terre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Western, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located on a cozy street you will find different sweet potato dishes with a variety of vegetables as toppings.  As of March 17, 2016, is vegetarian and vegan and takeaway only, but within two weeks, you can also dine-in for dinner. In addition, on March 26, 2016, they will be adding meat to the menu so vegans please go and support the vegan dishes. Take-away packaging is 100% biodegradable.
